title: Radisson Hotel Group adds 21 properties in India under 9 brands in 2023
description: K B Kachru, Chairman Emeritus and Principal Advisor of Radisson Hotel Group, South Asia, stated that the milestones achieved in 2023 have set a strong growth trajectory for the group in 2024. The strategic focus includes expanding roots and fortifying presence in untapped markets.
